‚öîÔ∏èNew Roguelike Challenge Arrived!‚öîÔ∏è

Dive into the Chaos Realm! 'Battle & Rush' before the Chaos Portal closes! Every playthrough promises a challenge and fun as you race down a changing 30-floor tower.
üç™ New Skills: Enhance your strategic play by summoning 6 companion cookies and using their power! 
üç™ New Weapons: The Magic Crossbow takes the gameplay to another level. The explosive area damage of the Boomstick! 
üç™ Leaderboard: Check your rankings on the leaderboard and see how you stack up against the competition!

Each level brings new surprises and challenges, making every playthrough uniquely exhilarating. Ready to take on the challenge? Join now and conquer the depths of chaos!

üí¨ This game in my honest opinion is a hidden gem.  - TruGamer4Realz

üí¨ It was a nice surprise and really enjoy it. -  langsvr1111

üí¨ LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS  - N3UROTIC 

‚ú®Step into the world of CookieRun! 2 billion downloads mobile hit!‚ú®

Play as GingerBrave, a freshly baked 15cm cookie armed with a candy cane and the power of friendship. Embark on a big adventure from a small perspective. 

To escape the Witch's castle, you'll have to defeat The Darkest Lord and his army, the magical creatures and monsters. But fear not, you won't be alone! Gather cookie companions and pets to accompany you on your journey and aid you in battle. 

Become the legendary GingerBrave, and bring light to The Darkest Night!

SNS
@studiofreshdoh"
